title: [Neuroscience] How the mother's mood influences her baby's ability to speak. Scientists found even children whose mothers suffer from mild depressive mood that do not yet require medical treatment show early signs of delayed language development.

[Health] Air pollution increases exposure to a radioactive gas that triggers heart attacks and strokes, according to research from Harvard University. It contains colorless and odorless radon, which is also the leading cause of lung cancer in non-smokers.
